TopicTitle: Figured I'd stop in and say Hi

Articles.Content:
Dont really have anything else to do for the moment, just stopping in to say Hi.

I prefer some form of Ion propulsion over nuclear thermal rockets, my motherships are sanely designed, if a bit on the big side, my Karbonite/Kethane super-rovers are 20 meter long 80 ton monsters (empty), and I only just upgraded to .90, having previously sat on .23.5 since .25 was released.

Oh, and my CPU, being a 8c/16t Xeon can pound your CPU into the dirt.

You only just upgraded to .90? Wot?

You should get 1.x.x, it's so much better.

Welcome aboard!

> 
> You only just upgraded to .90? Wot?
> You should get 1.x.x, it's so much better.
> 
> Welcome aboard!

I like to stay a couple versions behind, as it helps with the mods that I want not being all out of whack.
Most of the key gameplay and realism mods were updated to 1.0.x within days or weeks, you won't miss out a lot aiming for the current version.
